General.Name: Jiangmen Kanhoo Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangmen Kanhoo Industry Co., Ltd engages in the development, production, and manufacture of cathode materials in China. The company offers cathode materials for LIB, intelligent equipment for LIB, rare earth luminescent materials, LED luminescent materials, rare earth oxygen storage materials, and agricultural light-conversion materials. Its products are used in new energy vehicles, portable communication, electronics, lighting, catalyst and other industries. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Jiangmen, China.
General.Address: No. 22, JiaoXing South Road, Jiangmen, China, 529040
